Package org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.service

Class ClientService

java.lang.Object
org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.service.ClientService
@Service public class ClientService extends Object
Service class for handling operations related to customers.

The ClientService class provides methods for managing customer entities. This includes operations for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting customers. It interacts with the ClientRepository to perform these operations.

The service class is annotated with @Service, marking it as a Spring service component that should be managed by the Spring container.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientService

      public ClientService(ClientRepository clientRepository)
      Constructs a ClientService with the specified ClientRepository.

      This constructor initializes the service with the repository needed for performing customer-related operations.

      Parameters:
      clientRepository - The repository used to access customer data.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public List<Customer> getAll()
      Retrieves all customers from the repository.
      Returns:
      A list of all customers.

    • getById

      public Optional<Customer> getById(Long customerId)
      Retrieves a customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the customer if found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • save

      public Customer save(Customer customer)
      Creates a new customer in the repository.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to create.
      Returns:
      The created customer.

    • update

      public Customer update(Long customerId, Customer customer)
      Updates an existing customer in the repository.

      The customer with the specified ID will be updated with the information from the provided customer object. If the customer with the given ID does not exist, the method returns null.

      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to update.
      customer - The customer with updated information.
      Returns:
      The updated customer, or null if the customer with the given ID does not exist.

    • delete

      @Transactional public boolean delete(Long customerId)
      Removes a customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to remove.
